passive_1: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. For every stack, gain 4 ability power, up to 40 at maximum stacks. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.
Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill, 1 for assists, up to a maximum of 10. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.
passive_2: Gain 4 ability power for each stack of *Glory*.

passive_1: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill, 1 for assists, up to a maximum of 10. Lose 4 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.
passive_2: Gain 5 ability power for each stack of *Glory*.

passive_3: Grants 2 *Glory* for a champion kill or 1 *Glory* for an assist, up to 10 *Glory*. Lose 4 *Glory* on death.
